revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SnoutAttack}} '''A_SnoutAttack'''
Deals between 3 and 6 points of damage to a target within range. In addition, the calling actor plays the sound "PigAttack" on the VOICE channel if a target is successfully bit, and refocuses on the target.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Snout}} and derived classes.
{{DEFAULTSORT:SnoutAttack}}[[Category:Decorate Weapon attack functions]] [[Category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]
